ProductInfo.Features:
Package List: 1). 4 Channel H.264 DVR with 1TB Hard Drive installed ; 4). Sony CCD Waterproof Cameras ; 4). 60ft Video Power Combined Cables ; 1) Power Adapter Unit
DVR adopts the standard Main profile H.264 compression technology, supports CIF/D1 recording, Network transmission, and playback simultaneously
A remote control and mouse are included for easy setup and operation.
The DVR allows for access via 3G "Mobile Live" and through the internet at off site locations!
1/3'' Sony CCD Cameras provides 420 TV Lines very good resolution image.
ProductInfo.Name: 4 Channel CCTV Surveillance H.264 DVR + 4 x Sony CCD Waterproof Day Night Security Video Cameras Complete System (1TB HDD included)
